abstract: Bintrafusp alfa is a first-in-class bifunctional fusion protein composed of the extracellular domain of the human transforming growth factor β receptor II (TGF-βRII or TGF-β "trap") and human immunoglobulin 1 antibody which blocks programmed cell death ligand 1 (PD-L1).
